workflow.name: üìà Hourly monitoring of crypto rates with Alpha Vantage API and Google Sheets
workflow.description:
***Tags**: Crypto, Currency Exchange, Alpha Vantage API, Google Sheets*

### Context

Hi! I‚Äôm [Samir Saci](https://samirsaci.com),  a Supply Chain Engineer and Data Scientist based in Paris, and founder of [LogiGreen Consulting](https://logi-green.com).

I help companies automate data pipelines using **APIs**, **AI agents**, and **workflow automation** to improve operational visibility and decision-making.

This workflow is part of our **financial monitoring toolkit**, allowing businesses to **track real-time cryptocurrency exchange rates** for assets like BTC and ETH.

> Monitor crypto rates in real time and log the data to Google Sheets.

üì¨ For business inquiries, feel free to connect with me on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/samir-saci)

### Who is this template for?

This workflow is designed for **crypto analysts**, **finance teams**, or **automation enthusiasts** who want to collect and track crypto exchange rates automatically for reporting or analysis.

Let‚Äôs imagine you want to monitor BTC and ETH prices against the EUR:

[![Example Output](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/2025/06/image-26.png)](https://bit.ly/playlist-n8n-supplyscience)

The **Alpha Vantage API** is called every hour to collect the exchange rate, bid/ask prices, and timestamp. 

This data is saved in **Google Sheets** and can trigger a **Telegram alert**.

### How does it work?

This workflow automates the hourly logging of crypto exchange rates:

- ‚è∞ Schedule Trigger launches the workflow every hour  
- üåê Alpha Vantage API fetches BTC and ETH exchange rates (to EUR)  
- üìÑ Google Sheets node appends each result to a tab (BTC or ETH)  
- üì≤ Telegram node sends a summary alert with the latest rate info  

### Steps:

1. ‚è∞ Trigger every hour via Schedule node  
2. üåê Call Alpha Vantage API for BTC and ETH  
3. üìä Append rates, bid/ask prices, and timestamp to Google Sheets  
4. üì≤ Send a formatted Telegram message with the rate summary  

[![workflow](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/size/w1000/2025/06/image-27.png)](https://bit.ly/playlist-n8n-supplyscience)

### What do I need to get started?

You‚Äôll need:

- A free [Alpha Vantage API key](https://www.alphavantage.co/support/#api-key)  
- A **Google Sheet** with BTC and ETH tabs  
- A **Telegram bot** and Chat ID to send notifications  

### Next Steps

üóíÔ∏è Use the sticky notes in the n8n canvas to:

- Add your Alpha Vantage API key and Google Sheet credentials  
- Set your Telegram Chat ID and bot connection  
- Monitor and visualise real-time crypto prices with no manual input

### üì∫ Learn More with n8n Tutorials 

Get hands-on experience with automation through my comprehensive **n8n tutorial playlist**, featuring 18+ complete, step-by-step videos and ready-to-use templates.

[![n8n Playlist](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/size/w1600/2025/11/image-9.png)](https://bit.ly/playlist-n8n-supplyscience)
  

*This template was built using n8n v1.93.0*  
*Submitted: June 12, 2025*

workflow.name: üìà Hourly Monitoring of Crypto Rates with Alpha Vantage API and Google Sheets

parameters.content:
### 1. Workflow Trigger every hour

Trigger the collection of ETH and BTC price every hour.

#### How to setup?
*Nothing to do.*

### 2. Collect BTC and ETH price from Alpha Vantage Insight API
This starts by calling the CURRENCY_EXCHANGE_RATE function of the **Alpha Vantage Insight API** to get the exchange rate to euros.
#### How to setup?
- **Set up API credentials**
  1. Get your free API key from [Alpha Vantage](https://www.alphavantage.co/support/#api-key)
  2. Fill in the API key in the HTTP Request node using query parameters authentication
- **Load records in the Google Sheet Node**:
   1. Add your Google Sheet API credentials to access the Google Sheet file
   2. Select the file using the list, an URL or an ID
   3. Select the sheet in which you want to record your working sessions
   4. Map the fields:  `From_Currency_Code`, `From_Currency_Name`, `To_Currency_Code`, `To_Currency_Name`, `Exchange_Rate`, `Bid_Price`, `Ask_Price`, `Last_Refreshed`, `Time_Zone`												
  [Learn more about the Google Sheet Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googlesheets)
- **Send Telegram notification**
  1. Add your Telegram credentials
  2. Fill in the Chat ID and message content
  3. Use dynamic variables for formatting the exchange rate alert
